default_patch_notes: If explicit patch notes are not loaded for the detected version, do not invent specific buffs or nerfs.
Prioritize concrete in-match evidence (item timings, damage share, lane stats, comp shape) over patch speculation.

kayle.notes: Scaling pick: protect lanes and resources until key level/item breakpoints.

draven.notes: Snowball-focused lane bully that needs tempo conversion.

nasus.notes: Farm-to-scale profile with strong side lane pressure later.

lee sin.notes: Early agency jungler that benefits from proactive tempo and setup.

synergy_pairs.reason: Reliable knock-up chain enables clean all-in execution.
Layered AoE engage can decide grouped objective fights.
Point-and-click engage gives dependable dive access.

15: Use objective setup and reset timing as a major coaching lens for post-lane decisions.
